DOC.brief_summary: This study is an expansion of a previous study done to determine how thinking skills relate to hypoglycemia (low blood sugar) and certain regions of the brain in children and adolescents. In this study, the investigators are testing thinking skills and measuring brain activity in adolescents with and without type 1 diabetes mellitus.
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study of Hippocampal Function in Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus (T1DM)
DOC.criteria: Age 13 18 Right handed Diagnosis of Type 1 Diabetes OR normal sibling control If diabetic, then diagnosis for at least 2 years Pregnant or lactating Chronic disease other than wellcontrolled asthma, or Hashimoto's thyroiditis. Other current serious medical illness Comorbid psychiatric illness Comorbid neurological illness Prematurity at birth Contraindication to MRI scan orthodontic braces.
